smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function setValues has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'Prefs' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'SettingsFragment' with '17' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Object 'WidgetViews' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'

smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function loadPreferences is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class SettingsFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class DataMigration is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function loadPreferences appears to be too complex.
The function getIcon appears to be too complex.
The function migrationBCHABC appears to be too complex.
The function migrateExchangeCoinAndCurrencyNames appears to be too complex.
The function putValue appears to be too complex.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function migrateExchangeCoinAndCurrencyNames is nested too deeply.

smells.name: MethodOverloading
smells.description: Methods which are overloaded often might be harder to maintain. Furthermore, these methods are tightly coupled. Refactor these methods and try to use optional parameters.

instances.message: This method is overloaded too many times.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionThrown
smells.description: Thrown exception is too generic. Prefer throwing project specific exceptions to handle error cases.

instances.message: Exception is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.
RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.

smells.name: RethrowCaughtException
smells.description: Do not rethrow a caught exception of the same type.

instances.message: Do not rethrow a caught exception of the same type.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: MemberNameEqualsClassName
smells.description: A member should not given the same name as its parent class or object.

instances.message: A member is named after the class. This might result in confusion. Either rename the member or change it to a constructor.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: UnconditionalJumpStatementInLoop
smells.description: An unconditional jump statement in a loop is useless. The loop itself is only executed once.

instances.message: This loop contains an unconditional jump expression which essentially renders it useless as it will exit the loop during the first iteration.
This loop contains an unconditional jump expression which essentially renders it useless as it will exit the loop during the first iteration.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: com.brentpanther.bitcoinwidget.R.drawable.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
okhttp3.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
androidx.preference.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.brentpanther.bitcoinwidget.Coin.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: ProtectedMemberInFinalClass
smells.description: Member with protected visibility in final class is private. Consider using private or internal as modifier.

instances.message: Member with protected visibility in final class is private. Consider using private or internal as modifier.

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class Unit implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class JsonCoin implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (refresh.value) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: refresh.value

Parentheses in (context.resources.configuration.uiMode and
                Configuration.UI_MODE_NIGHT_MASK) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: context.resources.configuration.uiMode and
                Configuration.UI_MODE_NIGHT_MASK
Parentheses in (theme == "DayNight" && isNight) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: theme == "DayNight" && isNight
Parentheses in (theme == "Transparent DayNight" && isNight) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: theme == "Transparent DayNight" && isNight

Parentheses in (context.resources.configuration.uiMode and
                Configuration.UI_MODE_NIGHT_MASK) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: context.resources.configuration.uiMode and
                Configuration.UI_MODE_NIGHT_MASK
Parentheses in ((1 - TEXT_HEIGHT) / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (1 - TEXT_HEIGHT) / 2

smells.name: OptionalWhenBraces
smells.description: Optional braces in when expression

instances.message: Optional braces in when expression

smells.name: LoopWithTooManyJumpStatements
smells.description: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

instances.message: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.
